name: Spirit
description: Shape an empty island into a wacky ecosystem. The game puts you in the role as a stranded spirit, with the power to give and take life. Play trough the sandbox Free Mode, or 9 casual Adventure missions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.4ghz i7 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics (i7) card Storage: 1300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: 2.8ghz Quad Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4600 Storage: 1300 MB available space
